list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Remove 'front-manager/' from .gitignore
The 'front-manager/' directory is no longer ignored, likely to track its changes in version control. This update ensures that relevant files within the directory are included in future commits.

task.summary:
Initialize NestJS backend application structure
Set up a basic NestJS application with key components including the AppModule, controller, and service. Added configuration files, scripts, and testing setup for unit and e2e tests. Included a `.gitignore` and package management files to define project dependencies.

Integrate PostgreSQL and create project schema.
Added PostgreSQL connection using TypeORM with async configuration and .env support. Implemented initial database schema with tables for projects, phases, activities, milestones, documents, employees, and associated relations. Verified connection success with a test script. Updated `.gitignore` and dependencies in `package.json`.

Add core modules for user, project, role, and document management
Introduce key modules such as Users, Projects, Roles, and Documents with corresponding entities, DTOs, controllers, and services to handle CRUD operations. Additionally, implemented role-based access control (RBAC) using decorators, guards, and permissions handling, as well as initialized test data script for PostgreSQL.

Remove .idea/.gitignore from the repository
The .gitignore file under .idea is deleted to ensure irrelevant IDE-specific files are not tracked or mismanaged. This supports keeping the repository cleaner and more uniform across different development environments.

Create SQL script for database initialization
Add a new SQL script to initialize the database structure.

Remove compiled files and build artifacts from repository
Deleted compiled JavaScript files, type declaration files, and build-related artifacts from the dist directory. Updated the repository to no longer track build outputs and configuration fragments to ensure a cleaner codebase and reduce unnecessary repository clutter."

Refactor remove method to add explicit type annotation.
Added explicit type annotation for the 'activity' variable in the remove method to improve code clarity and type safety. This ensures better readability and adherence to TypeScript best practices.

Remove 'front-manager/' from .gitignore
The 'front-manager/' directory is no longer ignored, likely to track its changes in version control. This update ensures that relevant files within the directory are included in future commits.

MESSAGE.value:
Initialize NestJS backend application structure
Set up a basic NestJS application with key components including the AppModule, controller, and service. Added configuration files, scripts, and testing setup for unit and e2e tests. Included a `.gitignore` and package management files to define project dependencies.

Configure database integration and environment variables
Integrated PostgreSQL using TypeORM and added dynamic environment configuration support with `.env` files. Included connection testing script and updated dependencies to support database operations. Updated `.gitignore` to exclude sensitive environment files.

Integrate PostgreSQL and create project schema.
Added PostgreSQL connection using TypeORM with async configuration and .env support. Implemented initial database schema with tables for projects, phases, activities, milestones, documents, employees, and associated relations. Verified connection success with a test script. Updated `.gitignore` and dependencies in `package.json`.

Add core modules for user, project, role, and document management
Introduce key modules such as Users, Projects, Roles, and Documents with corresponding entities, DTOs, controllers, and services to handle CRUD operations. Additionally, implemented role-based access control (RBAC) using decorators, guards, and permissions handling, as well as initialized test data script for PostgreSQL.

Remove generated files, update type annotations, and add SQL script
This commit removes all unnecessary generated files and directories, such as build outputs and IDE configurations, improving repository cleanliness. It updates type annotations in `activities.service.ts` for better type safety. Additionally, a new `CreateDatabase.sql` script is added to assist with database setup.

Remove .idea/.gitignore from the repository
The .gitignore file under .idea is deleted to ensure irrelevant IDE-specific files are not tracked or mismanaged. This supports keeping the repository cleaner and more uniform across different development environments.

Create SQL script for database initialization
Add a new SQL script to initialize the database structure.

Remove compiled files and build artifacts from repository
Deleted compiled JavaScript files, type declaration files, and build-related artifacts from the dist directory. Updated the repository to no longer track build outputs and configuration fragments to ensure a cleaner codebase and reduce unnecessary repository clutter."

Refactor remove method to add explicit type annotation.
Added explicit type annotation for the 'activity' variable in the remove method to improve code clarity and type safety. This ensures better readability and adherence to TypeScript best practices.

Remove 'front-manager/' from .gitignore
The 'front-manager/' directory is no longer ignored, likely to track its changes in version control. This update ensures that relevant files within the directory are included in future commits.
